mapper.update: update app_ap_writeoff_verification set write_off_verification_id = #{writeOffVerificationId}, ref = #{ref}, date = #{date}, amount = #{amount}, note = #{note}, acccount_no = #{acccountNo}, allowance_account_no = #{allowanceAccountNo}, reference_no_tobe_writeoff = #{referenceNoTobeWriteoff} where write_off_verification_id = #{writeOffVerificationId};
